name: AOMEI Backupper File Backup File
summary: Learn about .AFI files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: To create an AFI file backup, select "Backup," then choose "File Backup." Select the file you want to back up and where you want to save the AFI file and click "Start Backup."
NOTE: AOMEI Backupper uses the .ADI file for saving disk image backup files.

description: Backup image format used by AOMEI Backupper, a Windows backup and recovery program; contains a backup of a file that can be used to restore a file when the file is corrupted or lost.
